Test Name: IDH1 (R132) and IDH2 (R140/R172) Mutation Quantitative Detection by ddPCR
Specimen Type: Fresh or frozen tissue, EDTA/Streck whole blood, or extracted DNA
Purpose: Quantitative detection of IDH1 (R132) and IDH2 (R140 and R172) mutations in DNA samples using droplet digital PCR
Container: EDTA tube or Streck tube for blood; appropriate sterile container for tissue
Equipment: Droplet Digital PCR system, droplet generator, thermal cycler, QX200 droplet reader
